# labelColor

**Type Property**

The primary color to use for text labels.

## Declaration

```swift
class var labelColor: NSColor { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this color in the most important text labels of your user interface. You can also use it for other types of primary app content.

## Label colors

- **secondaryLabelColor**: The secondary color to use for text labels.
- **tertiaryLabelColor**: The tertiary color to use for text labels.
- **quaternaryLabelColor**: The quaternary color to use for text labels and separators.
